title: Alhovuori Community Project - Survey
description: Welcome to Alhovuori community project planning! üå≤ This survey helps us map out shared visions, goals, and participation interest. Your answers help us build a community that meets everyone's wishes.

pages.name: intro
pages.title: üëã Basic Information
pages.description: Let's start with a few basic questions

elements.name: name
elements.title: Name

elements.name: contact
elements.title: Email

pages.name: activities
pages.title: üå± Activity Visions
pages.description: What do you hope will happen at Alhovuori?

elements.name: activity_preferences
elements.title: What kind of activities would you like for Alhovuori?
elements.description: Select the five most important ones

choices.text: üî• Borderland-style shared use for burners and other like-minded people
üé® Workshops and spaces for various arts and crafts
üí° Something else (tell us in additional info)

elements.name: first_year_focus
elements.title: What activities would you focus on during the first year?
elements.placeholder: E.g. 'First renovate basic facilities, then organize a couple of events in summer...'

elements.name: inspiration
elements.title: What inspires you about Alhovuori?
elements.placeholder: Tell us freely what excites and gives you hope about this project...

pages.name: participation
pages.title: üõ†Ô∏è Participation and Contribution
pages.description: How do you want to participate in building the community?

elements.name: time_commitment
elements.title: How much time could you dedicate to the project?
choices: A few hours per month (remote participation)

elements.name: contribution_types
elements.title: How would you like to participate?

elements.name: skills
elements.title: What skills do you have that you could offer the community?
elements.placeholder: E.g. 'I'm a carpenter', 'I know permaculture design', 'I do graphic design'...

elements.name: business_interest
elements.title: Would you like to conduct business at Alhovuori?
choices: Yes, I would actively like to run a business
Not myself, but I want to support others' businesses
No, I want to participate in other ways

elements.name: business_ideas
elements.title: If you have business ideas for Alhovuori, tell us about them
elements.visibleIf: {business_interest} = 'Yes, I would actively like to run a business' or {business_interest} = 'Yes, part-time or seasonally' or {business_interest} = 'Maybe in the future'
elements.placeholder: E.g. 'I'd like to run a summer cafe', 'I could organize yoga retreats'...

elements.name: investment_amount
elements.title: How much would you be willing to invest in the project?

choices.text: I won't invest money, but want to participate in other ways

elements.name: return_expectations
elements.title: What do you expect from your investment?

choices.text: No return expectations - the goal is to create value-based activities
Investment back over the long term (~10y) with reasonable returns (e.g. 2x)
Profitable business and continuous cash flow
Combination: value activities + reasonable long-term returns
Something else (tell us in additional info)

elements.name: payment_timeline
elements.title: When would you be able to invest?
choices: As soon as the company is established

elements.name: cabin_interest
elements.title: Are you interested in your own plot?
choices: Maybe, depends on price and terms
No own plot, but shared use is enough

elements.name: cabin_usage
elements.title: What would you use the cabin for?
elements.visibleIf: {cabin_interest} = 'Yes, interested if possible' or {cabin_interest} = 'Maybe, depends on price and terms'

elements.name: space_needs
elements.title: What shared spaces would you like for Alhovuori?

elements.name: visit_frequency
elements.title: How often do you estimate using Alhovuori facilities?

elements.name: priority_projects
elements.title: Which development projects were most important

elements.name: renovation_participation
elements.title: How much would you like to participate in physical construction and renovations?
elements.minRateDescription: Not at all, I'd rather pay

elements.name: longterm_vision
elements.title: What does your dream Alhovuori look like 10 years from now?
elements.placeholder: Tell us freely what the place looks like and what happens there in 2035...

pages.name: community_life
pages.title: üë• Community Life
pages.description: What kind of community do you want to build?

elements.name: openness_level
elements.title: How open should the activities be to outsiders?
choices: Events open, otherwise restricted to community

elements.name: governance_participation
elements.title: How actively would you like to participate in governance and decision-making?
elements.maxRateDescription: I want to be actively involved in decision-making

elements.name: conflict_resolution
elements.title: How would you like conflicts to be resolved?

elements.name: social_events
elements.title: What kind of community events would you like?
choices: Minimal - I mainly want my own peace

elements.name: main_concerns
elements.title: What things worry you about the project?

choices.text: üí∏ Running costs may be too high
‚è∞ Time commitment may be too large

elements.name: deal_breakers
elements.title: Are there any absolute 'deal breakers' - things that would make you withdraw from the project?
elements.placeholder: E.g. 'If forest is clear-cut', 'If running costs exceed X‚Ç¨/month'...

elements.name: must_haves
elements.title: What things are absolute requirements for you for a successful project?

elements.name: involvement_level
elements.title: What level of commitment are you at this stage?

choices.text: ‚úÖ Strongly committed - I definitely want to join
üîç Just exploring - let's see how it develops

elements.name: free_wishes
elements.title: Any other wishes, thoughts or ideas about the place?
elements.placeholder: Tell us freely whatever comes to mind...

completedHtml:
üéâ Thank you for your answers!

Your answers help us build a community that meets everyone's wishes and needs.

Next steps:

  1. We'll analyze the answers and map shared goals
  2. Organize a joint meeting to refine the vision
  3. Draft a detailed plan and shareholders' agreement

We'll be in touch soon! üå≤

completedHtmlOnCondition.html:
üéâ Thank you for your strong commitment!

It's wonderful that you're strongly committed to building the Alhovuori community!

Next steps:

  1. We'll analyze the answers and map shared goals
  2. Organize a joint meeting to refine the vision
  3. Draft a detailed plan and shareholders' agreement

We'll be in touch very soon! üå≤
